meta.job_title: Director of Nursing Skills and Simulation Center

duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the day-to-day operations of nursing simulation and skills laboratories for student learning and practice.
Collaborate with nursing faculty to schedule and facilitate simulation and skills laboratory experiences.
Develop, coordinate, and evaluate simulation-based education and events.
Implement and maintain the latest educational technology and teaching scenarios to enhance nursing clinical experience.
Manage the budget and supply needs of the Experiential Learning Center for nursing programs.
Teach didactic and/or clinical sections according to the needs of the nursing programs.
Remain engaged in developments within the field of higher education and communicate best practices to colleagues.
Participate in program recruitment, marketing, and provide demonstrations to various parties.
Performs other necessary duties and functions as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in Nursing from a regionally accredited institution. Current unrestricted Illinois RN license. Certified Healthcare Simulation Educator (CHSE) or equivalent.
